name: Kayfun Light
description:
A simple vanilla tobacco with notes of  honey and graham cracker. It’s the only thing I’m vaping on my kayfun lite atm, so thought I would share it with y’all 😊

Enjoy!👍
author: JOE_ROOTS

reviews.text:
I am not 100% sure how I feel about this. I'm not terribly into tobaccos but like to dabble in them once in a while. This gives me a decent fresh tobacco leaf feel, not quite a cigarette, not quite a cigar yet gives that smokeyness taste left in the mouth. Yet, while this is decently good out of a Kayfun Lite, every other puff or so, I get this wet, almost skim milk watery like taste/feel, almost like TFA Dairy Milk or a Sweet Cream of sorts. Maybe it's the CGC? I don't know. It's weird. 
Anywho, 4 stars.
